body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Aaron Howard and the customer's name is Rachel Butler.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Aaron Howard, and I represent MetaCar, your go-to car rental agency.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Aaron. I'm Rachel Butler. I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent booking.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rachel. I’m here to help you resolve any issues. Could you please confirm your booking number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two five three one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rachel. And may I also have your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have your email confirmed. Can you tell me the zip code associated with your address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one zero one two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Rachel. I will look into your booking and see how we can assist you better.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Aaron. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time today, Rachel. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
